title: doc, wiki: mention that Go 1.7 drops support for OpenBSD < 5.6
body: As mentioned in #13785, Go 1.7 drops support for OpenBSD 5.5 and earlier by assuming that `getentropy(2)` is available. This isn't a problem because OpenBSD 5.5 has been unsupported since May 2015, but it's worth mentioning in the release notes.
